thread.title: Attend Freshman Preview Day at Clayton State University and Stay at Hampton Inn Atlanta-Southlake
thread.title_full: Attend Freshman Preview Day at Clayton State University and Stay at Hampton Inn Atlanta-Southlake - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Attend Freshman Preview Day at Clayton State University and Stay at Hampton Inn Atlanta-Southlake
text:
Hampton Inn Atlanta-Southlake in Morrow, GA offers convenient lodging for Clayton State University Freshman Preview Day on October 10, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, October 06, Hampton Inn Atlanta-Southlake Morrow Georgia hotel offers convenient lodging for Freshman Preview Day at Clayton State University on October 10. High school juniors, seniors, and their parents will have an opportunity to take an in-depth look at CSU. Attendees will be able to tour the Morrow, Georgia, campus and meet faculty and current students. There will be group sessions with admissions and financial aid advisors, as well as time to learn about CSU degree programs.
"We are happy to welcome prospective CSU students and their parents attending Freshman Preview Day," shares Michelle Washington, the new General Manager at the Hampton Inn Atlanta-Southlake. "Our hotel is located just two miles from the Clayton State University campus," explains Ms. Washington.
This award winning Morrow hotel features nonsmoking rooms with microwave, mini refrigerator, and free high speed Internet. Guests will rest comfortably on Hampton Clean and Fresh Beds . Property amenities include a 24-hour business center, fitness center, and seasonal outdoor pool. The complimentary On the House Breakfast includes eggs, waffles, cereal, fruit, and other breakfast favorites. On the Run Breakfast Bags are available on weekday mornings. The Hampton Inn Atlanta-Southlake received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award.
Current lodging specials include the Weekend Getaway Package, with late checkout, and Book Early and Save. AAA, senior, and military rates are available. HHonors members can earn double points when booking the 2X Points Package. The Hampton Inn Atlanta-Southlake is located off I-75 at Exit 233, across from Southlake Mall.
To register for Freshman Preview Day at Clayton State University, visit www.clayton.edu . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn Atlanta-Southlake hotel in Morrow Georgia , call 770-968-8990 or visit www.HamptonInnSouthlake.com .
About the Hampton Inn Atlanta-Southlake
If you're looking for a great hotel in Morrow, you're sure to love the Hampton Inn hotel in Atlanta-Southlake. Located in the heart of Morrow, the hotel is just across from Southlake Mall, just two miles from Clayton State University and 15 miles from downtown Atlanta. This property offers a full range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.
For more information visit: http://www.HAMPTONINNSOUTHLAKE.com
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
Cardinal Web Solutions
